summary: Overhauls the characters of the epic Anna NPCs mod. Requires the newest version. Not lore-friendly.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#85200C][size=4]Warning: This mod is NOT "lore-friendly". If that bugs you, please don't download or comment. Don't waste our time, man. Thanks.

[img width=419,height=392]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65163-1-1430071785.png[/img]


[/size][/color][color=#1155Cc][size=5]Overview
[/size][/color][/b][size=4]This mod just changes the appearances of characters from the wonderful Anna NPCs mod. I will cover all of them, followers, inn keepers, etc.

Overhauled NPCs:

The Rift
* Anduniel (in Riften or Bee and Barb)

Whiterun Hold[/size]
[size=4]* Azura (Azzadal's Tears Tavern)
[/size][size=4]* Elyndra (Fort Greymoor)

[color=#1155Cc]
[size=5]Requirements:[/size]
[color=#ffffff]* [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58357/?]Anna NPCs 3_0[/url] by Anduniel (the latest version in the files section, with fixes recommended)[/color][/color][/size]
[size=4][color=#1155Cc][color=#ffffff]* [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?][color=#ffffff]Race Compatibility[color=#1155Cc] [color=#ffffff]for[/color][/color][/color] [color=#ffffff]Dawnguard[/color][/url][color=#ffffff]
[/color][/color][/size][size=4][color=#1155Cc][color=#ffffff]* Dawnguard DLC
* Hearthfires DLC
* Dragonborn DLC
[/color]
[/color][/size][color=#1155Cc][size=5][size=5]Possible Issues [/size]

[color=#ffffff][i]Lag -[/i]
Make sure you have XP32 Skeleton Extended if you use HDT Physics Extensions.

[i]Face Mismatch/Neck Seam -[/i]
Skyrim likes to store the weights of the NPCs with your saved game, so a
sudden change in their weight can make their face not match or fit their
body. You can fix this by opening the console with the ~ button on your
keyboard, clicking on the affected NPC, typing setnpcweight (any value
between 0 and 100), then pressing enter, disabling, and enabling.

[i]Ugly Faces -[/i]
You most likely have a conflict or are somehow missing the facegen data. If
you Nexus Mod Manager, you'll probably have to reinstall my mod. I'd
highly recommend Mod Organizer though because it lets you keep all the
original files in your mods, without them overwriting each other. Not to
mention it helps you see what mods conflict with what. And it doesn't
crash every two minutes. If you use MO, make sure your mod order on the
left side is the same as the load order on the right.
Load this esp and the files after Anna NPCs.

[i]Purple/blue Hairs, Foreheads, Eyes, ETC.-[/i]
I somehow missed a texture. Please let me know if this happens, and tell
me which NPC(s) it is. If I don't respond or update for a while, you
should probably download the mods in my credits section, just in case.
[i]
Pixelated Makeup - [/i]
Make sure you have your facetint set to 2048 in your skse ini file.

[i]Black face bug -[/i]
I really don't know why this happens. I've seen it happen with using Visual NPC
Transfers as well. Try changing the NPC's weight to 0 in the console,
then disabling, and enabling them. This should make their face normal
again.[/color]

Credits

[/size][/color][size=4][size=5]~ Tutorials/Forums Used for Bug-Fixing and Creation ~[/size]
* [url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1153491-body-disappears-after-removing-armor/]Body disappears after removing armor[/url] (thanks to [url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/4628100-isharameradin/]IsharaMeradin[/url])
* [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25673/?]Make a Standalone NPC by Natilde[/url]
* [url=http://tes5stuff.blogspot.com/2015/10/ece-character-to-create-npcfollower.html]ECE Character to NPC by JRCosta[/url]
* [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?%20*%20Dark%20Face%20Bug%20https://www.creationkit.com/index.php?title=Dark_Face_Bug]Enhanced Character Edit Description by tktk[/url]
* [url=https://www.creationkit.com/index.php?title=Dark_Face_Bug]Dark Face Bug[/url]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php/Using_a_face_made_with_RaceMenu_on_an_NPC_for_Skyrim]Using a Face Made with RaceMenu on an NPC for Skyrim[/url]
* [url=https://www.creationkit.com/index.php?title=ColorForm]How to add a Custom Hair Color to CK[/url]
* [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8429/?tab=5&&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D8429%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D1646388&pUp=1]Terrible Ten Minute Tutorial on Editing 3DNPC Faces[/url]
[/size]
[size=5]
[/size][size=5]
[/size][size=4][size=5]~ Programs Used ~[/size]
* NifSkope
* [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40494/?]NPC Nif Merge by turulo[/url]
* Creation Kit by Bethesda (available on Steam)
* Skyrim (buy it, if you haven't already XP)
* [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]Tes5Edit by ElminsterAU[/url]
[size=5]
~Resources Used~[/size]
[size=5]

Character Creation Mods -

* [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35713/?]ECEE - RANs Enhanced Character Edit Extended by RAN46[/url]

Eye Textures -
* [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74948/?]Lind's Elven Eyes by Lind[/url]
* [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60954/?]LiEyes by LithiumFlower[/url]

Face Tints-

Head meshes-
* Adorable face by Lumina

Hair Mods -
* [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHairs by Apachii[/url]
* [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?][size=4]KS Hairdos Renewal by Kalilies
[/size][/url][size=4]* SG Hairs by Hello Santa

Misc. -
* [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D65163&pUp=1]Forever Free by mysticentity[/url]

[i][size=4][size=5]Thanks to Anduniel (Anna) for Anna NPCs and the permission to make an overhaul for it! T[/size][/size][/i][/size][size=5][i]hank you to all modders and developers for the tutorials and permission to use your resources![/i][/size]

[size=4][b]
[color=#cc0000]Permissions:
PLEASE DO NOT RE-UPLOAD THIS TO OTHER SITES. THIS IS NEXUS-ONLY. Don't post it
in forums either just because, please. Please just give a link to the
original download.
Also, please do not use any of the facegen data for your own mods (unless they are only for personal use). THIS INCLUDES
IMPORTING THEM INTO RACEMENU AND EDITING THEM. You can get similar
results with the mods listed above.
There are many assets in this mod that do not belong to me, but are used with permission from the
authors. If you want to use them, you'll have to download their original
files, and ask the authors yourself (or read the description and check
the tags).
[i][size=5]***Translations and compatibility patches are perfectly fine, but please do not include my files.***[/size][/i]
Thank you![/color][/b][/size]
author: SugoiNeko
